content: maybellene is the february 2018 square for the annual ravelry bam cal visit the group and check out the awesome cal they host by clicking here 1 designer s notes this square is really easy to make and lots of fun the post stitches and popcorns offer opportunities for color play and add lots of dimension the pattern has lots of helpful photos so if you think this might be too difficult why not give it a try i think you ll be surprised at just how easy it is see the bottom of the webpage for a print friendly option instructions are included for a 9 inch version that does not have the popcorn stitches <hr> visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 2 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 3 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 4 visiting polly s place on ravelry 5 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 6 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 7 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/2018-crochet-block-a-month-cal 2 everytrickonthehook com 3 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 4 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 6 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 7 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
